content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.09 > Section 74.09.037 74.09.035 << 74.09.037 >> 74.09.050 PDF RCW 74.09.037 Identification card — Social security number restriction. Any card issued by the authority or a managed health care system to a person receiving services under this chapter, that must be presented to providers for purposes of claims processing, may not display an identification number that includes more than a four-digit portion of the person's complete social security number. [ 2011 1st sp.s. c 15 s 4 ; 2004 c 115 s 3 .] NOTES: Effective date — Findings — Intent — Report — Agency transfer — References to head of health care authority — Draft legislation — 2011 1st sp.s. c 15: See notes following RCW 74.09.010 .
